item.title: Park on electric charging bay without charging, 18th February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Fly Tipping on Street outside Gayhurst School in the middle of the pavement on the bike racks and is obviously on public land. item.title: Idling construction vehicles, 18th February
item.description:
HSM has been doing roadworks in this area for a few weeks. They constantly are idling their vehicles, presumably so someone can stay warm inside. This happens for hours at a time. It’s very wasteful and the fumes are irritating and unhealthy to deal with.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Fanshaw Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repair to pavement and road, 18th February
item.description:
The white markings have been there for about 6 months. Someone turned up yesterday sat in his van for 10mins then spend 5mins doing the repair which is laughable to say the least. He put a small amount of concrete and the rest was filled with sand. The next down pour of rain we get will wash the lot away so the problem will still be there. Also why did he not repair the road?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lockesley Drive, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti, 18th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10a, 10b, Talfourd Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
